generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA Portable Air Conditioner is the thing that makes you comfortable in any season

Tone: informal

Audience: everyone
generations.text: Summer is unbearable, but with QOOLA Portable Air Conditioner, you can stay cool and comfortable all summer long! It's also perfect for winter, keeping you warm on those cold days. It's small and lightweight, so you can take it with you wherever you go, and it's easy to set up.
